title: How can I use the synonyms feature on iOS?
content:
Grammarly can suggest synonyms for the words you use in your text. To use the synonyms feature, please open the Grammarly app, tap
Keyboard
, and switch on
Synonyms
.
Once this feature is enabled, open any app and tap on any text field to pull up the keyboard. If youâ€™d like to see synonyms for a certain word, simply tap on the word in the text and choose a synonym in the completions bar of the keyboard.
Note:
If you use Grammarly on your iPad, please review
this article
.
